lines.text:
WHILE HIGH IN THE CASTLE, THE
                OTHER IN-

VADING ARCHERS BATTER THE EARL
                AND

HIS SWORDS DOWN THE MAIN
                STAIR...
CLASH OF STEEL AND SOON THE

THE BATTLING OUTLAWS FAN OUT,
                SURROUND THE

START TO HURL ASIDE THEIR
                WEAPONS, BEG

AS ROBIN ADVANCES ON THE
                EARL, THE TRERCHEROUS

NOBLE FLINGS HIS SWORD FULL
                AT THE OUTLAW'S HEAD...

IN A FLASH, ROBIN TWISTS
                ASIDE, LUNGES FORWARD...

HIS STEEL RIPS TROUGH THE
                EARL'S CLOTHING,PINS

HIM HELPLESSLY TO THE BACK OF
                A HEAVY
